Title: The Most Powerful Tool: Good Documentation
Description: My scribe apprentice, do you feel ready for writing today? The Dragonscale Expedition has brought copious notes from their adventures, and they have asked that we compile their chicken-scratch penmanship into a suitable compendium for field-ready review. And oh, my hand is simply not up for the task today. Could I rely on you once more?
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Core Explorer's Compendiums for Talendara in Valdrakken.
